definition: to discharge water/to appear out of the water/to break the surface

to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
as a lotus flower breaking the surface (idiom); surpassingly beautiful (of young lady's face or old gentleman's calligraphy)
lit. lotus rises from the water (idiom); fig. to blossom (of poem or art)
to float up (idiom); to become evident/to surface/to appear

sentences.english: High lift pump , but water is not applicable to.
sentences.chinese: 離心泵揚程較高，但出水量不大，適用於。

sentences.english: The depth it reaches before disappearing gives a measure of water clarity.
sentences.chinese: 它在達到消失的深度之前，可以測量出水的清晰度。

sentences.english: Holy stream temple has more than ten outlet through millennium still limpid.
sentences.chinese: 聖泉寺中有十多個出水口，歷經千年依然清澈。

sentences.english: The bottom part of each separation container unit is provided with water outlet passage pointed back and downward.
sentences.chinese: 各分離容器單元的底部均有指向後下方的出水通道。

sentences.english: Or the little finger acts first.
sentences.chinese: 或者說，小手指領先出水。

sentences.english: He said the Taliban had asked him to bring the tractor and help them pull a tanker.
sentences.chinese: 他說，塔利班的人讓他們用拖拉機把燃油車拉出水”。

sentences.english: Triple oxidation ditch was used to treat anaerobically digested effluent of piggery wastewater.
sentences.chinese: 研究了T型氧化溝工藝對豬場糞水厭氧出水處理。

sentences.english: Siphonic outlet is one of the outlet forms in pump stations.
sentences.chinese: 虹吸式出水管是泵站的一種出水佈置型式。

sentences.english: Siphonic outlet is one of the outlet forms in pump stations.
sentences.chinese: 虹吸式出水管是泵站的一種出水佈置型式。

sentences.english: The action of effluent recycle on an upflow anaerobic filter is very complex.
sentences.chinese: 出水迴流對上流式厭氧濾器的影響非常複雜。

sentences.english: Trap outlet pipe should not be immersed in water.
sentences.chinese: 疏水閥的出水管不應浸在水裏。

sentences.english: The outlet of the water pipe was blocked.
sentences.chinese: 水管的出水口被堵住了。

sentences.english: Both water inlet and outlet pipelines should be supported by a separate stand and not by the pump body.
sentences.chinese: 進出水管路應另設支架支撐，不得籍泵本體支撐。

sentences.english: Shark's Lip defrost completely and blanche with ginger water to remove fishiness .
sentences.chinese: 魚脣絲解凍後再以薑片出水，可闢除腥味。

sentences.english: The sprayer pipe has the advantages of easy manufacture of water outlet, convenient connection and convenient operation.
sentences.chinese: 這種噴灌管出水口易加工，連接方便，使用簡便。

sentences.english: The reason of outbursting water in No. 1 North Opencast Pit is analyzed. And the controlling methods are put forward.
sentences.chinese: 分析了一號露天北坑常出水的原因，提出了治理措施。

definition: upper reaches (of a river)/to go upstream/to add some water/to water (a crop etc)
to have water get in (one's ear, shoes etc)/to get flooded/inflow of water
Qingshui (place name)/Shimizu (Japanese surname and place name)
Shuili township in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan
to turn on the water/to let water out/to throw a game (sports)
cold water/unboiled water/fig. not yet ready (of plans)
